 Are you kidding?! 'Reaction from the crowd' got twisted into 'mass riots' and 'the sky falling'. Classic strawman. Distort what someone says, then claim triumph when your twisted rendition doesn't bear out. He's pretending that because society didn't collapse everyone in the crowd was perfectly happy with that display. He probably has no idea how the float was actually received, but he wants to make the assertion that no one cared, thus the strawman.
